title: Self Soothing Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Five Senses Inventory
exercises.description: Create a personalized list of self-soothing activities for each sense. Keep it handy for moments of distress and update it regularly with new discoveries.

exercises.title: Soothing Space Creation
exercises.description: Designate a calming area at home with comforting items like soft fabrics, scented candles, or calming music. Make it your go-to place for self-care.

exercises.title: Mindful Soothing Exercise
exercises.description: Pick one sensory activity and focus entirely on it for five minutes. Observe how it affects your mood and body with patience and curiosity.

exercises.title: Reflection Journal
exercises.description: After using Self-Soothing, write about the experience with compassion. What worked? What didn't? How did it impact your emotional state?

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
